name: Balls fight
description:
WebGL decompresses audio when loading so audio will not be heard for the first couple of seconds. Play the downloadable version if this bothers you; and yes, WebGL sucks!

Roses are red, violets are blue.
Purple with yellow comes back to red.
Colors are best when live in harmony.

Balls fight is a colorful top-down shooter submitted to Different Colors game jam with the theme You are the boss of the game. Balls fight features 4 types of enemies that react differently when being killed and you have to prioritize shooting them to make the most of it. How far can you push it?

My interpretation of the theme was a bullet hell where you get to make your own bullet pattern, however it is not very obvious in this game so I leave it to your judgement. 

Original idea was implemented for a 30min mini gamejam called Emofight, which has only 2 types of enemy. A post-jam version of the game with the glow effect can be played with the downloadable labelled _Glow.

I hope you have fun!
